name: @lincot/solana-chunk-loader
description: Helpers for the Chunk Loader Solana program

scripts.build:browser-esm: bun build src/index.ts --format esm --target browser --minify --sourcemap --external:@coral-xyz/anchor,@solana/web3.js --outdir dist --entry-naming '[name].mjs'
scripts.build:node-esm: bun build src/index.ts --format esm --target node    --minify --sourcemap --external:@coral-xyz/anchor,@solana/web3.js --outdir dist --entry-naming '[name].node.mjs'
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/index.ts --format cjs --target node    --minify --sourcemap --external:@coral-xyz/anchor,@solana/web3.js --outdir dist --entry-naming '[name].cjs'
scripts.build: bun run build:browser-esm && bun run build:node-esm && bun run build:cjs && bun run build:dts
